thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: John Hinton
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by John Hinton

author: John Hinton
title: John Hinton
text:
Our car rental at Queenstown (for a week in summer) went smoothly from beginning to end, including doing the airport pickup after-hours, and adding an extra name to the approved driver's list.
Any after-hours pickup or drop-off requires you to do a little homework by reading their instructions, as Omega doesn't have a booth within the Queenstown airport terminal. If your flght gets in after business hours your car (with docs) will be waiting for you in the airport carpark, so do go through their confirmation notice to understand how to find it. You will also have to pay the parking charge when exiting the carpark, and this cost is not included in Omega's charges. Ours was $19 for an 8pm collection, so no big deal over a week.
Adding an extra driver was just a matter of popping into their office in town & all done in 2 minutes.
Nice car (we had the 2013 Corolla hatch), clean, much bigger than I expected (huge amount of rear legroom, so perfect for 4 adults).
Highly recommended!
